name: Rix Digital
description: Rix Digital has a number of services, including acquisition, lead generation, content writing and PR. We utilise a variety of techniques and channels to provide paid media models that are ROI positive for our clients. We have had successes in the past with almost every industry we've tried from insurance, to PPI.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
The Business Development Manager we are looking for is both well-connected and self-starting. Working remotely, our BDM will need to be motivated to bring in new business and earn our extremely competitive commission package. 

This is not a role where your every move will be supervised, but it is a results-based business. You should be confident that you know or, at least, know how to get access to the people who make decisions on marketing spend and ready to sell. 

This is a 3 month contract position with a view for a full time contract in the near future. Wage is negotiable but will be weighted with an extremely competitive commission.
